title: Snapchat, Instagram and WhatsApp Quality on Pixel 5!
content:
I have just upgraded from my pixel 3xl to the pixel 5. I cannot believe how the front camera (also back) photos look on Snapchat, Instagram and WhatsApp. 

It's shocking and really bad. For a flagship phone that cannot do basic social media in 2020 it's terrible.  The photos look completely different and morphed after you click the shutter button (not in a good way at all, nothing like my pixel 3xl). The photos for the most part come out looking soft and very noisy. 

I know people may say it's down to the app developer, but I don't understand how it can be so much worse than my Pixel 3XL. Will be returning and switching to an S20 (which I tested and is fineish).
